title: How to Make Pizza Lunchables

steps.headline: Open the box of Pizza lunchables.
steps.description: Remove the cardboard with either your hands or with scissors then peel off the plastic carefully starting at a corner.

steps.headline: Take a crust out from the box.
steps.description: Choose how many pizzas you want to make depending on how hungry you are.

steps.headline: Find the pizza sauce and rip the top across the dotted line.
steps.description: Carefully tear the sauce packet open with your hands across the dotted line or use a pair of scissors.

steps.headline: Pour some of the sauce on one pizza crust.
steps.description: Apply pressure to the sauce packet to allow the sauce to come out.

steps.headline: Spread the sauce on the crust with the top of the sauce packet.
steps.description: Run the sauce packet or your fingers over the pizza crust making sure the pizza sauce is evenly distributed.

steps.headline: Add the toppings.
steps.description: Locate the cheese and pepperoni in the lunchable and sprinkle some of the cheese over the pizza sauce then lay the pepperoni on top.

steps.headline: Cook the pizza.
steps.description: Place the pizza onto a microwave safe plate and pop it into the microwave for 15 seconds or until the cheese is melted.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Remove the pizza from the microwave and enjoy your childhood snack!

text: Open the box of Pizza lunchables. Remove the cardboard with either your hands or with scissors then peel off the plastic carefully starting at a corner. Take a crust out from the box. Choose how many pizzas you want to make depending on how hungry you are. Find the pizza sauce and rip the top across the dotted line. Carefully tear the sauce packet open with your hands across the dotted line or use a pair of scissors. Pour some of the sauce on one pizza crust. Apply pressure to the sauce packet to allow the sauce to come out. Spread the sauce on the crust with the top of the sauce packet. Run the sauce packet or your fingers over the pizza crust making sure the pizza sauce is evenly distributed. Add the toppings. Locate the cheese and pepperoni in the lunchable and sprinkle some of the cheese over the pizza sauce then lay the pepperoni on top. Cook the pizza. Place the pizza onto a microwave safe plate and pop it into the microwave for 15 seconds or until the cheese is melted. Serve. Remove the pizza from the microwave and enjoy your childhood snack!
